item.name: Gold

item.desc: Gives one free pull from any Box or Chance Pack. Must be used within 25 days.

item.desc: Magical dust that can be used to upgrade cards.

item.desc: Collect 20 Resin to craft a Runecrafter's Pouch.

item.desc: Gives a Standard Set Common card or better!

item.desc: You gain the effect "Primal Mending" which heals your creatures for 2 every turn in battle. Lasts for 5 days.

item.desc: Combine with 20 Smoldering Embers and 50 Obsidian Gravel to hatch.

item.name: Obsidian Gravel
item.desc: Gravel from the base of the Tarragon Peak, scorched by centuries of dragon's fire.

item.name: Smoldering Ember
item.desc: A smoldering ember gathered from the Tarragon Peak.

item.name: Dragon Hatchling
item.desc: A single, tiny, slightly warm dragon hatchling. Needs the warmth of a mother dragon's fire.

item.name: Dragon Mother's Fire
item.desc: Captured dragon's fire. Combine with 50 Dragon Hatchlings to earn the Dragon Tamer's trust.

item.name: Golden Lava Vial

item.desc: The Mini Jellyfish are the power supply for the underwater temple. Collect to bolster your power in Pharos Temple!

item.name: Temple Crystal
item.desc: Combine this Temple Crystal with Pharite Snapjaw's Spellstone to earn a new card!

item.name: Pharite Snapjaw's Spellstone
item.desc: This fish egg seems to have a creature inside it. Combine with Temple Crystal to summon Pharite Snapjaw!

item.name: Fireshard
item.desc: The fiery fragment can instill new powers in latent gemstones. Collect to bolster your power in Fireshard Mine!

item.name: Metallic Fireshard
item.desc: The metallic fragment glows with a different energy than average fireshards. Combine with Cog Spellstone to summon Vali, the Thunderer!

item.name: Cog Spellstone
item.desc: This cog has some kind of creature in it. Combine with Metallic Fireshard to summon Vali, the Thunderer!

item.name: Breezy Wind
item.desc: This Elemental powers up the Celestial Orbs. Collect to bolster your power in The Celestial Vault!

item.name: Dawn Feather
item.desc: It's a feather from a legendary bird that only appears at Dawn. Combine with Spiky Egg to summon Eos!

item.name: Spiky Egg
item.desc: You can hear something moving beneath the egg's spiky layer. Combine with Dawn Feather to summon Eos!

item.name: Word Eater
item.desc: This little spirit is attracted to written words and glyphs, powering up Yuriel's Mystic Tomes. Collect to bolster your power in Skyhaven!

item.name: Liquid Fire
item.desc: The contents of this bottle are eternally bubbling, despite the glass being cool to the touch. Combine with Rimelight Crusader's Spellstone to summon Rimelight Crusader!

item.name: Rimelight Crusader's Spellstone
item.desc: The frigid feather has been carefully preserved in eternal ice. Combine with Liquid Fire to summon Rimelight Crusader!

item.name: Bonbon Sparklers
item.desc: Rock candy shaped like a small firework, it pops loudly when consumed. Collect to bolster your power in Goblin Rise Stronghold!

item.name: Goblin Gadget
item.desc: The goblins use this device to train dragons to obey them. Combine with Pinpin, Dragon Handler's Spellstone to summon Pinpin, Dragon Handler!

item.name: Pinpin's Spellstone
item.desc: This dragon egg Spellstone houses the dragon Broodus and his master Pinpin. Combine with Goblin Gadget to summon Pinpin, Dragon Handler!

item.name: Tropical Coconut
item.desc: The coconut has absorbed the nutrients and magical properties from the island's sandy soil. Collect to bolster your power in Forgotten Island!

item.name: Hollow Coconut
item.desc: This coconut is light, just a shell of a greater creature. Combine with Zind's Spellstone to summon Hunter Zind!

item.name: Zind's Spellstone
item.desc: This fish egg Spellstone contains the essence of the great hunter Zind. Combine with Hollow Coconut to summon Hunter Zind!

item.name: Golden Leaf
item.desc: Ground golden leaves contain enough energy to kickstart your airship's functions. Collect to bolster your power in Golden Crown Village!

item.name: Raw Iron
item.desc: Frogs who can stomach iron are said to grow steel skin. Combine with Stoneclad Toad's Spellstone to summon Stoneclad Toad!

item.name: Stoneclad Toad's Spellstone
item.desc: This Dawnglow flower is heavily coveted by the Golden Crown Frogs. Combine with Raw Iron to summon Stoneclad Toad!

item.name: Black Blossom
item.desc: Flowers that have absorbed The Void's power after being exposed to massive amounts of energy. Collect to bolster your power in Desolate Red Valley!

item.name: Obsidian
item.desc: Elementals can absorb this volcanic rock to grow harder skin. Combine with Gem Harvester's Spellstone to summon Gem Harvester!

item.name: Gem Harvester's Spellstone
item.desc: This Spellstone has a small lightning bug inside it. Combine with Obsidian to summon Gem Harvester!

item.name: Dragon Claw
item.desc: Dragons exposed to arcane energy shed their claw sheaths, which can be used as an energy catalyst. Collect to bolster your power in Tarragon Peak!

item.name: Mother's Fire
item.desc: Mother Dragons from Tarragon have the hottest fiery breath. Combine with Ignus' Spellstone to summon Ignus!

item.name: Ignus' Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone with a baby dragonling cracking from its shell. Combine with Mother's Fire to summon Ignus!

item.name: Gladius Coin
item.desc: Currency used to upgrade your gear and friends' abilities. Collect to bolster your power in Gladius Arena!

item.name: Angel Hawk Feather
item.desc: A feather plucked from an Avian so noble that he became an Angel. Combine with Habrok's Spellstone to summon Habrok, the Lance!

item.name: Habrok's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone with a beating heart beneath the oddly-furred shell. Combine with Angel Hawk Feather to summon Habrok, the Lance!

item.name: Corroded Mist Pearl
item.desc: Mist pearls that have lost their power to summon Scylla. Collect to bolster your power in Duskwillow Rebuilt!

item.name: Dark Gold Key
item.desc: A key with the power to open a dark dimension. Combine with Messina's Spellstone to summon Messina's Choice!

item.name: Messina's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that has seen better days. Combine with Dark Gold Key to summon Messina's Choice!

item.name: Dark Honey
item.desc: The Beetleton residents' cuisine has been imbued with strange energy. Feed them to Rayne's Spiritlings to unlock their power in Distorted Beetleton!

item.name: Revolution Flame
item.desc: A flame of burning revolution. Combine with Warrior Karna's Spellstone to summon Warrior Karna!

item.name: Warrior Karna's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that has seen better days. Combine with Revolution Flame to summon Warrior Karna!

item.name: Enchanted Iron
item.desc: Natural Minerals in the Salt Wastes radiate with a special energy. Use them on the Temple Glyphs to increase their power!

item.name: Tadpole Egg
item.desc: A small egg with a tadpole inside. Combine with Sproutfrog's Spellstone to summon Sproutfrog Rainwisher!

item.name: Sproutfrog's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that Decim's dragonling took a bite off of. Combine with Tadpole to summon Sproutfrog Rainwisher!

item.name: Pillar Soul
item.desc: A soul lost in The Abyss. Send them to the Titans so they can recover their power!

item.name: Whitesail's Spellstone
item.desc: An egg left in a nest home of both a dragon and avian. Combine with Dragon Breath Crystal to create Whitesail Wyvern!

item.name: Dragon Breath Crystal
item.desc: A dragon mother's warm breath of fire, enshrined in a crystal. Combine with Whitesail's Spellstone to create Whitesail Wyvern!

item.name: Soul of Silver
item.desc: A budding Elemental born of wind and water. Collect to bolster your power in Stormy Seastone Citadel!

item.name: Avalanche Equine Spellstone
item.desc: An express request for the continent's finest Elemental Steeds. Combine with Elemental Residue to summon Avalanche Equine!

item.name: Elemental Residue
item.desc: Remnant stones carried by Elementals, now imbued with their power. Combine with Avalanche Equine Spellstone to summon Avalanche Equine!

item.name: Void Essence
item.desc: A bottle of Undead Essence combined with power from The Void. Collect them for Malchior to build his Defense System!

item.name: Void Flower
item.desc: A flower that has bathed in the unholy light from The Void. Combine with Reks' Spellstone to Summon Reks, the Forlorn!

item.name: Reks' Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing a former tragic Goblin King's spirit. Combine with Void Flower to summon Reks, the Forlorn!

item.name: Wyld Leaf
item.desc: A leaf from a tree that has grown with unnatural magic. Collect them and use them to fuel your Airship!

item.name: Fallen Crest Feather
item.desc: A Feather from the Fallen Crest order. Combine with Wrath's Spellstone to Summon Wrath!

item.name: Wrath's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing an Angel of the Fallen Crest. Combine with Fallen Crest Feather to summon Wrath!

item.name: Void Remnant
item.desc: A leftover remnant of The Void. Purge them to fuel the ancient technology in the Swamp!

item.name: Dawnglow Flower
item.desc: An arcane flower from Dawnglow. Combine with Conjured Dragon's Spellstone to Summon Conjured Dragon!

item.name: Conjured Dragon's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing a legendary dragon of water. Combine with Dawnglow Flower to summon Conjured Dragon!

item.name: Wisp Fragment
item.desc: A tiny spirit that can band together to become a soul wisp. Use them to power Yuriel's Tomes!

item.name: Bloodmist Feather
item.desc: A Feather from the lost marsh of Bloodmist. Combine with Bloodmist Harpy's Spellstone to summon Bloodmist Harpy!

item.name: Bloodmist Harpy's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing an artificially made creature. Combine with Bloodmist Feather to summon Bloodmist Harpy!

item.name: Karthos Ember
item.desc: An ember from the land of Karthos, imbued with magical properties. Use them to power up the Karthos Crystals!

item.name: Karthos's Flame
item.desc: An everburning flame from Karthos. Combine with Slagspirit's Spellstone to summon Slagspirit!

item.name: Slagspirit's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing an ancient spirit of Karthos. Combine with Karthos's Flame to summon Slagspirit!

item.name: Dragon Talons
item.desc: The spirits of dragon legends who died protecting Tarragon Peak. Receive their blessing by offering Dragon Talons!

item.name: Tropical Callstone
item.desc: A Coconut imbued with magical properties of a tropical island. Combine with Siren's Spellstone to summon Siren!

item.name: Siren's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing the soul of a half goblin, half fish. Combine with Tropical Callstone to summon Siren!

item.name: Gladius Currency
item.desc: An ancient, now unused currency that still motivates spirits of the Fallen. Collect to bolster your power in Gladius Scriptorium!

item.name: Acquatic Soul
item.desc: A small creature found living in a Skyhaven pond. Combine with Noble Swordfish's Spellstone to summon Noble Swordfish!

item.name: Noble Swordfish Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone formed from a tear of Scylla. Combine with Acquatic Soul to summon Noble Swordfish!

item.name: Angel Plume
item.desc: A feather doused in the magical properties of Skyhaven. Collect to bolster your power in Skyhaven Assault!

item.name: Fiery Soul
item.desc: A soul forged in the lava depths of Tarragon. Combine with Herald of Judgement's Spellstone to summon Herald of Judgement!

item.name: Herald of Judgment's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone formed between the earth of Tarragon and air of Skyhaven. Combine with Fiery Soul to summon the Herald of Judgement!

item.name: Element Soul
item.desc: A small spirit formed from the powers of Aether, Chaos, and Wyld. Collect to bolster your power in Conflux Convergence!

item.name: Void Soul
item.desc: A soul trapped in the Void. Combine with Shattered Spellstone to summon Shatterstone Anomaly!

item.name: Shattered Spellstone
item.desc: A collection of shattered Spellstones. Combine with Void Soul to summon Shatterstone Anomaly!

item.name: Random Goblin Reward Epic Choice
item.desc: A choice from 4 random ^c0DFFEpic ^cFFFFGoblin cards from Reward Set!

item.name: Inscription Powder
item.desc: Used for Runecrafting. Found during Missions.

item.name: Universal Solvent
item.desc: Used for crafting Legendary Rewards. Purchased from the Store.

item.name: Rare Runeshell
item.desc: The key ingredient for Rare Runes. Found during Bounties.

item.name: Epic Runeshell
item.desc: The key ingredient for Epic Runes. Found during Bounties.

item.name: Legendary Rune Sliver
item.desc: One of three slivers needed to create a Legendary Rune. Found during Bounties.
